layout.name: text
layout.title: Dialogue
layout.tooltip: The text that appears when it speaks.

layout.name: message
layout.title: Voiceline
layout.tooltip: The voiceline that plays when it speaks. Check voicelist.txt for the corresponding voicelines. If set to 0, no sound will play.

layout.name: messageCustom
layout.title: Custom Voiceline
layout.tooltip: The sound that plays when it speaks.

layout.name: useCustom
layout.title: Use Custom Voiceline
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Talking Flower will use the custom voiceline instead.

layout.name: text2
layout.title: Second Dialogue
layout.tooltip: The text that appears when it speaks.

layout.name: message2
layout.title: Second Voiceline
layout.tooltip: The second voiceline that plays after the first. Check voicelist.txt for the corresponding voicelines. If set to 0, no sound will play.

layout.name: messageCustom2
layout.title: Custom Second Voiceline
layout.tooltip: The second sound that plays after the first.

layout.name: useCustom2
layout.title: Use Custom Second Voiceline
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Talking Flower will use the second custom voiceline instead.

layout.name: has2nd
layout.title: Use Second Dialogue
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Talking Flower will talk again after the first time with different dialogue.

layout.name: radius
layout.title: Radius
layout.tooltip: The radius of how close you can get without it talking. Note that it is automatically doubled, so putting in 16 will actually be 32 in-game.

layout.name: msgduration
layout.title: Dialogue Duration
layout.tooltip: How long it takes in frames for the Talking Flower to stop talking. Note that this does not automatically adjust to the current voiceline.

layout.name: cooldown
layout.title: Dialogue Cooldown
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes before the Talking Flower can talk.

layout.name: alwaysTalk
layout.title: Always Talk
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Talking Flower will always talk.

layout.name: eventName
layout.title: Event
layout.tooltip: The event that the Talking Flower talks on.

layout.name: eventMsg
layout.title: Play Dialogue on Event
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Talking Flower will only talk on an event.
